REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1709 reute r f BC-JOSEPHSON-<JSON.O>-RE 10-20 0052

TEXT.TITLE: JOSEPHSON <JSON.O> REPURCHASES 445,874 SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Josephson International Inc said it repurchased 445,874 common shares yesterday under an authorization to buy back up to 500,000 shares and its board has authorized the further repurchase of another 500,000 shares in the open market and privately. Reuter
